name: URoRRuR'R'R's Hunting Rifle
Lore: 'Owning a hunting rifle is an important status symbol in Tusken culture. URoRRuR''R''R scavenged this weapon from a starship wreck near Anchorhead.',
Text: 'Use 1 Force to deploy on URoRRuR''R''R or Chief Bast, 3 on your non-droid character. May target a character or creature using 1 Force. Draw destiny. Subtract 1 if targeting a character. Add 2 if targeting a creature. Target hit if total destiny > defense value.',
